articles.title: Chief of KPA Panmunjom Mission Sends Telephone Message to U.S. Forces Commander in S. Korea
articles.content:
Chief of KPA Panmunjom Mission Sends Telephone Message to U.S. Forces Commander in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are escalating dangerous military pressure on the DPRK, having confabs for slapping brigandish new "sanctions" against it over its satellite launch, its legitimate and independent right, and underground nuclear test for self-defence to protect it.
					 They are mulling kicking off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK again on March 1 in a bid to bring dark clouds of a war of aggression to hang over Korea despite the strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad. They are employing such sleight of hand as "notifying" the DPRK side of this "in advance". 
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the hostile acts and military racket of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and their followers against the DPRK.
					
					 Pak Rim Su, chief of the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army, sent the following message to James D. Sherman, commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea, in this regard at 9 a.m. Saturday:
					
					 As you know, a grave situation where a war may break out any moment prevails in Korea due to the brigandish moves of the U.S. and its allied forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK, taking issue with its just satellite launch and underground nuclear test for protecting its sovereignty. 
					
					 If your side ignites a war of aggression by staging the reckless joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle again under the cover of "defensive and annual ones" at this dangerous time, from that moment your fate will be hung by a thread with every hour. 
					
					 You had better bear in mind that those igniting a war are destined to meet a miserable destruction while a great victory is in store for the guardians of justice.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Visit Hotel for Contributors to Successful Third Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Visit Hotel for Contributors to Successful Third Underground Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and Choe Yong Rim premier of the Cabinet, Friday and Saturday visited the hotel which hosts scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defence science and solider-builders who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test.
					 They are now spending pleasant days in Pyongyang, given greatest favor and privilege.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam and Choe Yong Rim visited the hotel to warmly congratulate the praiseworthy heroes.
					
					 They said that the spectacular success made in the underground nuclear test represented a signal victory in the history of the nation as it clearly showed that Korea does what it is determined to do.
					
					 They noted that the whole country respects the nuclear weapons developers as genuine patriots because they dealt telling blows at the U.S. imperialists and their followers through their independent nuclear test.
					
					 They called on them to further develop the nation's nuclear technology.
					
					 Senior state officials asked them to make positive contributions to bolstering up the nuclear deterrent, the greatest patriotic legacy of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, in every way and glorifying the DPRK as a matchless nuclear weapons state. 
					
					 Prior, Secretary Pak To Chun and other officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the hotel.

articles.title: State Decorations Awarded to Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
State Decorations Awarded to Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- State decorations went to 11,592 scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials in high recognition of their feats performed for the successful nuclear test and the striking demonstration of the independent dignity of Songun Korea and its mettle to win victory after victory.
					 100 were awarded title of Hero of the DPRK with a gold star medal and Order of National Flag First Class, and 17 Order of Kim Jong Il, and 19 Kim Jong Il Prize and 50 Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize.
					
					 12 received the title of People's Scientist, 24 the title of Meritorious Scientist, 20 the title of Merit, 300 Order of National Flag First Class, 950 Order of Labor, 3,000 Order of National Flag Second Class, 300 the Order of Soldier's Honor 1st Class, 3,000 Order of National Flag 3rd Class, 800 the Order of Soldier's Honor 2nd Class,
					
					2,000 Medal of Merit; 1,000 Distinguished Military Service Medal.
					
					 The relevant decree of the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK was promulgated on Feb. 21.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful Third Underground Nuclear Test Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful Third Underground Nuclear Test Tour Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Saturday.
					 They first laid a floral basket before the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the ministry to pay tribute to them.
					
					 Service personnel and lecturers of the museum warmly greeted them, putting garlands around their necks and presenting them with bouquets.
					
					 At the Revolutionary Museum they looked round historic data and relics showing the exploits the Generalissimos performed by developing the Korean People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Their visit to the museum offered an opportunity to keenly realize that the dignity and sovereignty of the nation could be firmly defended and tremendous military capability of the DPRK demonstrated before the whole world as they held the great men of Mt. Paektu in high esteem.
					
					 They also visited the People's Open-air Ice Rink and the Skate Park.
					
					 Their employees warmly welcomed them.
					
					 The visitors went round various places of the ice rink and skate park and spent a pleasant time, enjoying skating.
					
					 They vowed to make a new leap forward  in the development of nuclear technology, feeling deeply grateful to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for inviting them to Pyongyang and giving them greatest favor and privilege.

articles.title: Nuclear Developers' Stay in Pyongyang Incites Workers' Zeal for Production
articles.content:
Nuclear Developers' Stay in Pyongyang Incites Workers' Zeal for Production
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The arrival in Pyongyang of scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who contributed to the successful 3rd underground nuclear test has greatly encouraged the workers in the city to increase production.
					 Pae Chol Jun, a worker of the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, told KCNA:
					
					 "The recent nuclear test is an actual countermeasure taken by the country to defend its security and sovereignty.
					
					 The heroic feat performed by the nuclear developers is stirring up workers.
					
					 I will redouble my efforts to boost the production of various kinds of electric cables, following the spirit displayed by those admirable heroes of the nation."
					
					 Han Jin Ok, an engineer of the Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory, said:
					
					 "The successful nuclear test is a historic event that displayed the potentials of the DPRK's science and technology.
					
					 Inspired by it, I will do my best to step up the updating of production processes at the factory."
					
					 Hyon Nam, a workshop head of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, said:
					
					 "No threat can frighten the DPRK people united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I will work hard to bring about a fresh surge in electricity output with the spirit of dealing a heavy blow at the U.S.-led hostile forces."

articles.title: Greetings to Guyanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guyanese President
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Donald Ramotar, president of the Cooperative Republic of Guyana, on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of the proclamation of the republic.
					 Kim in the message wished the president and people of Guyana success in their work for the prosperity of the country in the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow strong.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Decries Lee Myung Bak's Retirement Address
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Decries Lee Myung Bak's Retirement Address
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak recently made a retirement address. As was the case with his inaugural address five years ago, the recent address was also a shameless and arrogant farce and burlesque.
					 His address was full of self-praises in which he loudly talked about sort of "success" and "achievements" during his five years in office.
					
					 Earlier he set afloat videos and information praising himself. He also made a radio internet speech as the last one in his tenure in which he let loose a spate of lies that he "worked heart and soul to become a man serving the people, not a man in authority."
					
					 He even put his name in the list of winners of so-called "highest order" in south Korea to receive it.
					
					 This clearly revealed his true colors as a kingpin of thieves who is accustomed to political pocket-picking.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that south Koreans of all social standings unanimously criticized the address, saying that it is replete with poor excuses and self-praises. No signs of reflecting on or feeling responsible for its crimes of pushing the people to destitution and deteriorating the north-south ties could be found in his address, they said.
					
					 What should not go unnoticed is that the traitor found fault with the DPRK while justifying his policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen to the last.
					
					 This is just a last-ditch effort of a politically dead man who is making desperate efforts to avoid a ruin after covering up all the huge crimes he committed against the nation.
					
					 As known, during his office Lee made south Korea be more dependent on the U.S., deteriorated the people's livelihood and plunged the north-south ties to a deadlock.
					
					 The serious situation created on the Korean Peninsula is attributable to the hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. being displeased with the unity and reunification of the Korean nation and the confrontation racket kicked up by the group of traitors led by Lee.
					
					 Traitor Lee is the rubbish of history who can not be buried in the territory of the nation after his death.
					
					 He is seriously mistaken if he thinks he can join the south Koreans' community as an "ordinary citizen".
					
					 Clear is the fate awaiting Lee. He is bound to have hard time even on his journey to the other world.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Reason for Its Access to Nuke
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Reason for Its Access to Nuke
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- It was the biggest fault that the U.S. pushed the DPRK to access nukes even though it was an unavoidable outcome the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK resulted.
					 The recent third underground nuclear test carried out by the DPRK was a resolute step for self-defence taken by it to cope with the U.S. hostile acts of wantonly violating its legitimate right to launch satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The test conducted when the long nuclear standoff with the U.S. has entered a serious phase meant a proud victory of justice over injustice in the fierce standoff in the fields of politics, diplomacy, military affairs and economy.
					
					 By nature, the DPRK felt no need to conduct the nuclear test nor had any plan.
					
					 Its goal was to concentrate our efforts on economic construction and the improvement of people's living standard by relying on the nuclear deterrence it already built up for self-defence.
					
					 The launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was aimed to set up correct weather forecast and natural disasters prevention system, solve raw materials and fuel problem and shore up agriculture, mining, metal and all other fields through correct estimation of the country's underground resources.
					
					 The satellite launch essential for economic development and improvement of people's living standard was a legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The U.S., however, has denied and insulted only the DPRK's right to satellite launch, fabricated unwarranted "resolution on sanctions" and has viciously employed whole spectrum of hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 It made hostile forces to show off military muscle and create a war atmosphere and gambled on the DPRK's right to existence.
					
					 This was the exact motive of the DPRK's decision to conduct a nuclear test.
					
					 The past decades brought home to Koreans the truth that peace does not come of itself and the economic development and the improvement of the people's living standards can be guaranteed only by powerful nuclear deterrence. The DPRK, therefore, had no other choice but to carry out the nuclear test to safeguard its sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. is the chief culprit that compelled the DPRK to access and bolster nuclear deterrence by pursuing the hostile policy.
					
					 The misjudgment and mistake made by the U.S. in its DPRK policy and in the execution of the policy were based on its inveterate repugnance for the DPRK and bitterness to it.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy aimed at the socialist system in the DPRK has become all the more undisguised, constantly making the latter to take tougher measures for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK repeatedly expressed its stand that it could not but reexamine in an all-round way the nuclear issue in the light of the U.S. increased anti-DPRK moves and warned that if the U.S. fails to choose a correct policy, the DPRK will "modernize and expand the nuclear deterrence to be unimaginable by the U.S." 
					
					 The wrong option taken by the U.S. while regarding the DPRK as a thorn in the flesh is the very reason that drove the DPRK to opt for developing, acquiring and possessing nuclear weapons. This is the unanimous comment of the international community.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes and its measure for bolstering them were all a reaction to the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The nuclear stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S. will never end in a game.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Makes Speech at UN Special Committee Session
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Makes Speech at UN Special Committee Session 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate made a speech at a session of the Special Committee on the Charter of the UN and on the Strengthening of the Role of the Organization on Feb. 19. 
					 He said that the principle of respect for sovereignty and equal sovereignty is the core of the UN Charter and the basic foundation of the international relations. 
					
					 Key in the activities of the UN which regards the world peace and security as its fundamental mission is to observe the principle of respect for sovereignty and equal sovereignty, he said. 
					
					 No peace and security of the world can be expected apart from this principle, he added, and went on:
					
					 The Special Committee on the Charter of the UN and on the Strengthening of the Role of the Organization must live up to the expectations of the international community and UN member nations by taking account of the present situation in its work, where the use of the armed forces on the basis of the logic of strength is getting undisguised and highhanded and arbitrary practices by a specified country that is lording it over the UN Charter is becoming serious. 
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is the biggest hotspot where a war may break out any moment and this situation arouses serious concern of the international community. 
					
					 This is entirely attributable to the wrong behavior of a specified country, permanent member of the UN Security Council, which abuses the body as a tool for meeting its political purposes. 
					
					 In this regard, the DPRK delegation would like to call attention to the following issues:
					
					 First issue is that of the signboard of "UN Command" that has been abused by the U.S. forces in south Korea for decades.
					
					 This year marks the 60th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement concluded in 1953 and the 63rd year since the U.S. forces in south Korea put up the illegal signboard of the "UN Command".
					
					 Citing typical facts to prove the illegal and anachronistic nature of the "UN Command", the DPRK delegate said the "UN Command" in south Korea should be removed at once in line with the resolution of the 30th Session of UN General Assembly as it gives adverse effects to the authority of the UN.
					
					 The DPRK delegate noted:
					
					 Second one is the issue of the attitude taken by the UN Security Council to the legitimate satellite launch of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's activities for space exploration are an entirely just exercise of its sovereignty as a party who signed the Outer Space Treaty. It is stipulated in Article 24 of the UN Charter that the primary mission of the UNSC is to protect world peace and maintain its security. 
					
					 Article 1 of the Outer Space Treaty indicates that space shall be researched and used in the interests of all countries, and clarifies that it is a common wealth of humankind.
					
					 In the final analysis, there is no reason from legal point of view for the DPRK's space activities to become a target of sanctions of the UNSC.
					
					 It is an illogical nonsense and trick on the international community to assert that the DPRK poses a "threat to the international peace and security" because it used "ballistic missile" technology as the U.S. alleges.
					
					 Among UN member states the U.S. launched most of satellites including military satellites. It is also the U.S. which keeps most of nuclear-capable intercontinental ballistic missiles in the world and is very keen on establishing the worldwide missile defence system for preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 It is in accordance with the U.S. logic to assert that the U.S. is the biggest threat to the world peace and security and it should be the first target of sanctions of the UNSC.
					
					 There were no less than 2,000 nuclear tests and at least 9,000 satellite launches in the world since the UN came into existence. But never has there been even a single resolution of its Security Council that banned nuclear test and satellite launch.
					
					 The U.S. which carried out the most nuclear tests and satellite launches in the world cooked up the UNSC's "resolution" that prohibited only the DPRK from conducting nuclear test and launching satellite. It is a violation of international law and height of double-standards.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer be allowed to seriously infringe upon the independent right of the DPRK to use the space for peaceful purposes nor should it be allowed to abuse the UNSC as a tool for executing its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should seriously respond to the just demand of the DPRK that it should select one alternative of opening the phases of detente and stability by respecting the DPRK's right to satellite launch or continuing to go along the wrong way as it does now by pushing the situation to the point of explosion being pursuant to its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 We would like to clarify once again that the recent third nuclear test was carried out as part of the practical countermeasures for defending the country's sovereignty and security to cope with the ruthless hostile act of the U.S. which wantonly infringed upon the DPRK's legitimate right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The DPRK delegate said he is convinced that the Committee will pay due attention to taking necessary steps to make sure that all member states strictly abide by the principle of equal sovereignty, core of the UN Charter and basis of the international relations, as the essence of the situation created on the Korean Peninsula is a serious issue of whether the sovereignty of a UN member state is respected or violated.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Exercise of Right to Collective Self-Defense
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Exercise of Right to Collective Self-Defense
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- A spate of outbursts calling for allowing the exercise of the right to collective self-defense  heard from among Japanese reactionaries these days go to prove that Japanese militarism is emerging the most dangerous aggressor forces in the international arena. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article:
					
					 Japan is a war criminal state and a defeated nation.
					
					 At the time when the Second World War came to an end, Japan had to be disarmed and left as a pacifist state under law as a war criminal state.
					
					 As a result, Japan adopted "the Pacifist Constitution" which gives assurances to the international community that it will not go to war but renounce the reinforcement of military muscle and pursue peaceful existence in the post-war period.
					
					 Accordingly, Japan has so far remained a country with the right to exclusive self-defense and a country which legally abandoned the exercise of the right to collective self-defense.
					
					 By the right to collective self-defense the Japanese reactionaries mean that even in case its ally, not Japan, comes under attack, it will have the right to declare a war and participate in it. Japan's intention is to take the road of overseas expansion under the pretext of its ally's security.
					
					 It is the sinister scenario of Japan to regain the rights to belligerency and involvement in the war as a defeated nation in the Second World War under the pretext of the right to collective self-defense.
					
					  In this way Japan is apparently seeking to dominate Asia and, furthermore, realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 It is a daydream for the Japanese reactionaries to realize the above-said old dream by launching overseas aggression, talking about the exercise of the right to collective self-defense.
					
					 The world will never allow Japan to exercise the right to collective self-defense.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Fabricates False Case
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Fabricates False Case 
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors kicked up a suppression racket against the Teachers' Union, alleging that it revealed the first "enemy-benefiting organization" ever led by the union.
					 On Feb. 21 the Seoul Central District Court prosecuted without restraint four teachers belonging to the union on charges of the violation of "Security Law".
					
					 The fascist prosecution charged that they formed the "enemy-benefiting organization" called the "education movement in the new era" in January 2008 and carried out "organized activities to favor the north" and "disguised its activities as those of legitimate organization to avoid the law."
					
					 It even described their activities for studying the Juche idea, Songun politics and calling for reunification by federal formula, withdrawal of U.S. troops and abolition of the "Security Law" as an act of "spreading the advantages of the social system in the north and imparting the north's assertions to the public".
					
					 It also found fault with a slogan hung on a classroom wall, deliberately linking it with the DPRK.
					
					 The fabrication of another false case targeting the progressive organization of south Korea is aimed to raise the wind of confrontation with the fellow countrymen and thus quench the daily mounting spirit for reunification through alliance with the north and clamp down on pro-reunification movement organizations and civic and public bodies.
					
					 The recent case signals forthcoming wholesale crackdown on progressive forces which stand for democratization of society and reunification movement. 
					
					 But with nothing can the puppet group quell the south Koreans' strong desire for reunification.

articles.title: Tug of War, Traditional Sporting Event of Korea
articles.content:
Tug of War, Traditional Sporting Event of Korea
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The January 15th of the lunar calendar is one of folk holidays for the Koreans, and it falls on February 24 this year.
					 On the day, the Korean people have traditionally taken such national food as Ogokbap (boiled rice mixed with four other staple cereals), Yakbap (glutinous rice mixed with sugar, dates, chestnuts, pine-nuts, sesame oil, etc.) and dishes made of nine kinds of dried edible herbs, while playing folklore amusement and sporting games.
					
					 Typical of those folklore games is tug of war, which is most popular among the people. The game can be played in any place and any time with involvement of many people.
					
					 In olden times, this game would be held between different villagers with a rope twisted with rice straw or arrowroot. The twisting was made collectively by villagers. When a game was finished, its winners danced to the tune of farm music with the rope on their shoulders.
					
					 The tug of war, considered to be a representation of unity of the collective, is still a favorite sporting event among the Korean people.

articles.title: Sci-tech Festival Held by DPRK's University
articles.content:
Sci-tech Festival Held by DPRK's University
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The 28th Science and Technology Festival of Kim Chaek University of Technology in Pyongyang took place on Feb. 20-22.
					 Shown in forms of models, diagrams and CD at the festival were more than 160 scientific achievements greatly conducive to updating the national economy.
					
					 Yang Ki Chol, director of the Scientific Research Department of the university, told KCNA:
					
					 "Teachers, researchers and postgraduates of the university have made lots of scientific achievements to further develop the nation's leading industrial sectors.
					
					 Among them are establishment of copper production process based on hydrometallurgy and double high impedance UHP electric arc furnace, both which have proved effective in practice.
					
					 The copper production process by hydrometallurgy helps prevent environmental pollution while reducing electricity consumption by half and raising the production rate over 15 percent than the previous one. The double high impedance UHP electric arc furnace is an advanced steel production system relying on home-made electrode."
					
					 Jo Chol Ryong, a teacher of the university, said: "What catches the eyes among the exhibits at the festival is the method of production of steel castings based on boron, titanium and rare-earth elements which are abundant in the country.
					
					 There are also inventions helpful to making production processes on CNC and non-man basis."

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower, Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Liberation Tower, Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here Saturday laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on the occasion of the Day of Defender of the Motherland.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Russian Ambassador Alexandr Timonin, Military Attache Dmitri Zheleznikov and other staff members of the embassy and military attaches of foreign embassies.
					
					 A wreath was laid before the tower in the name of the embassy. Then the participants paid silent tribute to fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 Staff members of the embassy laid a wreath and flowers before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang on the same day.

articles.title: Japan's Abuses of Koreans' Rights Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Abuses of Koreans' Rights Slammed
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean Human Rights Association in Japan issued a statement on Feb. 20 denouncing the Japanese government for getting evermore pronounced in the human rights abuses against the students of Korean schools in Japan with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purpose and nuclear test for self-defense as occasions. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are pushing for additional "measures on sanctions," openly infringing upon the right of vice-chairmen of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan to visit their homeland. Against this backdrop a disturbing atmosphere of national chauvinism reigning in the Japanese society has reached such a dangerous phase that it is no longer tolerable.
					
					 Moreover, inhuman and wanton human rights abuses are openly perpetrated against the right to learn of students at Korean schools.
					
					 The right of the Koreans in Japan to national education is the basic human rights recognized by the International Treaty on Human Rights and the Treaty on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination. Therefore, Japan is obliged to observe those treaties. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, some self-governing bodies of Japan are taking an unreasonable step of suspending the payment of educational subsidies to Korean schools, talking about a political reason. 
					
					 The statement strongly condemned the Japanese authorities' discriminating actions against the Koreans and Korean schools in Japan as unpardonable, base and grave human rights abuses.
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to stop at once the unreasonable human rights abuses and sincerely fulfil its legal duty to guarantee all the rights including the right of Koreans in Japan to national education.

articles.title: Vishwanath Visits Breast Tumour Institute
articles.content:
Vishwanath Visits Breast Tumour Institute
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, visited the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					 Going around the institute fully furnished with modern medical apparatuses, he was impressed to know about enormous efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il for the good health of women and the loving care shown by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for them.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Condemned
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Condemned
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement titled "Japanese reactionaries will have to pay high price for their illegal suppression" on Feb. 19.
					 The association and all Koreans in China cannot repress their surging national resentment at the Japanese authorities' unwarranted politically-motivated suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the statement said.
					
					 Such base racket fully reveals the anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon moves of Japan which is in pursuance of the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, it noted.
					
					 The Japanese government's suppression is a premeditated politically-motivated plot to destroy Chongryon organizations as it is an arrogant and illegal criminal act, it charged, and went on:
					
					 Chongryon is a legitimate overseas citizens organization of the DPRK which protects all democratic national rights and interests of Koreans in Japan. It is, at the same time, playing the role of diplomatic mission for promoting friendship with Japanese as the DPRK and Japan have no diplomatic relations.
					
					 The suppression of such dignified Chongryon and Koreans in Japan amounts to an unpardonable act of encroaching upon the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are persisting in their hostile policy toward the DPRK, far from honestly apologizing and repenting of the crimes committed in the past when they inflicted all sorts of misfortunes and sufferings on the Korean nation.
					
					 The true patriotic activities of Chongryon are unanimously supported and hailed by the international community.
					
					 We strongly demand the Japanese authorities immediately lift "sanctions" against vice-chairmen of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and all other unreasonable "sanctions", facing up to the trend of the times, and fairly ensure the human rights and life of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Joint Military Maneuvers of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers under Fire
articles.content:
Joint Military Maneuvers of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Huge armed forces including Aegis destroyer, escort ships, submarines and sea-patrol planes are involved in the joint anti-submarine exercises of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces that kicked off in the East Sea of Korea on February 19 and will last till February 24.
					 This saber-rattling includes "drill for detecting and tracking ballistic missiles" and "exercises for detecting and attacking sea-patrol planes", etc. now under way  under the signboard of "coping with threat."
					
					  Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime have reached an extremely reckless phase in their moves to ignite a war on the Korean Peninsula and invade the DPRK.
					
					  A "nuclear threat" touted by the puppet regime is nothing but sophism to cover up its scenario to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces are putting spurs to establishing a system for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 This is evidenced by the facts that the south Korean military bosses openly cried out for "preemptive strikes" recently, trumpeting about "sign of the north's nuclear attack," and they are busy staging drills for making surprise cruise missile strikes by infiltrating submarines into the territorial waters of the north side by stealth.
					
					 The joint anti-submarine maneuvers now under way in the East Sea of Korea are a dangerous provocative racket seeking "preemptive nuclear strike" at the DPRK.
					
					 In face of this hard fact the fair public at home and abroad clearly sees who is the arch criminal posing a nuclear threat to the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet regime are the dangerous aggressor forces threatening peace and security on the peninsula, pursuant to their scenario for a nuclear war.
					
					 They had better bear in mind that the warnings of the DPRK are by no means an empty talk, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' North-targeted War Maneuvers Assailed by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' North-targeted War Maneuvers Assailed by S. Korean Organization
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea held a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 20 at which it denounced the U.S. and puppet warmongers for their dangerous war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					 A statement was read out at the rally. It urged the authorities to stop actions against the north, including the war maneuvers being staged against it in league with the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in the hostile policy toward the DPRK, it will not stop strong countermeasures, the statement said, demanding the U.S. lift the unreasonable "sanctions" and stop the war maneuvers.
					
					 It called upon all patriotic and democratic forces to turn out in the struggle against the U.S. and warmongers' war maneuvers against the north in order to remove the danger of war from the Korean Peninsula at an early date.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to observe the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 They were a gathering in Peru, seminar in India and reading session in Guinea that took place on Feb. 11 and 13.
					
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were photos showing the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", in his speech said Kim Jong Il devoted his whole life to the Korean revolution, the cause of global independence and the people's happiness and prosperity.
					
					 He strictly observed the principle of Juche in ideology, independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defense, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung, said Lopera, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force and the Korean People's Army into an invincible one.
					
					 The great exploits he performed for the cause of socialism and global independence will last forever.
					
					 Aleasar Ramos Roarte, chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Roberto Carbonel Peso, chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for the Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, and Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent thinker and theoretician and the sun of the 21st century.
					
					 S.P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, said he was a tender-hearted father of the people who loved them so much and devoted his all to their happiness.
					
					 His politics of love for the people has been fully embodied by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the chairman added.

articles.title: "Korea-Japan Protocol", Fabrication of Japanese Imperialists
articles.content:
"Korea-Japan Protocol", Fabrication of Japanese Imperialists
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists in the past cooked up lots of "treaties" in Korea as a precondition to turn Korea into their colony.
					 Among them is the "Korea-Japan Protocol", which was made under the military threat and blackmail.
					
					 The "protocol" was aimed at putting the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910) under Japan's control ahead of the Russo-Japanese War, thereby creating favorable conditions for the war and building a legal guarantee for colonizing Korea beforehand.
					
					 To this end, the Japanese imperialists adopted in December 1903 a decision on dispatching Japanese armed forces to Korea under the pretext to defend it from outside forces' invasion.
					
					 After unleashing the Russo-Japanese War, they forced the draft "protocol" upon the Feudal Joson Dynasty, but it was rejected by some of the ministers for its aggression nature.
					
					 Upset by such opposition, they arrested those ministers and had the "protocol" signed on February 23, 1904, in the absence of them.
					
					 This document was a deceptive one, disguised by such rhetorical phrases as "peace in the East" and "Korea's sovereignty and its territorial preservation".
					
					 It was a "treaty" for aggression, in essence, as it was aimed to shoulder a big share of burden of war upon the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test Hailed in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test Hailed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Romanian and Bangladeshi personages made public statements on Feb. 14 and 15 hailing  the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test.
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said that the DPRK's successful nuclear test was another proud victory won in confrontation with the U.S. and a great auspicious event for progressive mankind.
					
					 The association will extend full support and encouragement to the Korean people all out in the standoff with the U.S., the chairman noted.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said that the nuclear test conducted by the DPRK was a resolute step for self-defence to cope with the U.S. hostile acts.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to counter the U.S. escalated nuclear threat with nuclear deterrent, the chairman stressed.
					
					 The Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies in a statement on Feb. 14 said:
					
					 We support the DPRK's decisive measure against the U.S. hostile acts.
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering up of nuclear deterrence makes it possible to consolidate the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea in a statement on the same day said that the DPRK's successful nuclear test would contribute to defending peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Cuba, Romania and Hungary on Feb. 14 and 15 to celebrate the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The principal of DPRK Primary School in Marianao District, Havana, Cuba said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the great guiding idea in the era of independence, gave full play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses and firmly protected the sovereignty of the country by dint of Songun.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and military power, making a great contribution to the cause of Korea's reunification and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union noted that the DPRK could turn into a great country which made great development in all fields thanks to Kim Jong Il, adding that the DPRK today would be unthinkable without his wise leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for the exploits he performed for global independence.
					
					 They extended full support to the principled stand of the DPRK to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Carried by Zimbabwean Paper
articles.content:
Short Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Zimbabwean newspaper Herald carried the brief biography of general secretary Kim Jong Il on February 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups praising general secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Lao newspaper Pasason on Feb. 15 carried an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il and his life" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper cited facts to prove that he successfully realized the cause of immortalizing the leader with lofty moral obligation towards President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il led a simple life, said the paper, adding:
					
					 He saw to it that statues and monuments were erected in honor of the revolutionary martyrs and those who rendered distinguished services for the country, but disallowed the erection of his own statue.
					
					 People's happiness was his greatest pleasure.
					
					 Thanks to his dedication, the DPRK could firmly defend socialism and bring about a turning point in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Another Lao paper Vatelao carried a special article praising his patriotic life accompanied with a portrait of the smiling leader on the same day.
					
					 The Indian papers Krishna Aberta and Indian and World Event on Feb. 10 and 15 each dedicated one whole page to articles under the captions of "Kim Jong Il's patriotism", "Music and Kim Jong Il" and "He believed in people as in Heaven" illustrated with his photos.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on Feb. 12 said in an article titled "Snow and Kim Jong Il" praised his history of love for the people, saying his exploits would be remembered forever by the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de aviacion y paracaidismo del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de aviacion y paracaidismo del EPC
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de aviacion y caida de los infantes paracaidistas de las Fuerzas Aereas y Antiaereas y de la gran unidad combinada 630 del EPC.
					 Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol, Choe Kyong Song, Rim Kwang Il, Kang Ki Sop, Son Chong Nam, Ro Hung Se, Yun Jong Rin, Choe Pu Il, Hwang Pyong So, Ra Chong Il y Hong Yong Chil.
					
					 Para chequear la disposicion de las unidades para la movilizacion en el combate, el Comandante Supremo dio la orden de ejercicios a las Fuerzas Aereas y Antiaereas y a la gran unidad combinada 630 del EPC.
					
					 En el puesto de vigilancia, escucho las explicaciones del comandante de ejercicio sobre el plan de entrenamientos y se entero en detalles del estado de preparacion y de los efectos que causan en las maniobras las desfavorables condiciones climaticas.
					
					 Acorde a las circunstancias indicadas por el Comandante Supremo, los aviadores cumplieron con agilidad y exactitud el despegue y el aterrizaje utilizando la autopista que sirve de aeropuerto.
					
					 Acto seguido, comenzo el entrenamiento de descenso de los infantes paracaidistas.
					
					 Pese al viento fuerte, los infantes cayeron con exactitud en el punto previsto cumpliendo bien los metodos y movimientos de combate, adiestrados en los ejercicios cotidianos.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo dijo que los ejercicios se realizaron muy bien y los aviadores y paracaidistas cumplieron excelentemente sus dificiles misiones a pesar de las adversas condiciones climaticas.
					
					 Esto es el resultado de la excelente calidad de los ejercicios rutinarios que realizaron ellos, evaluo.
					
					 El combate no esta sujeto a las condiciones del tiempo y el enfrentamiento con los enemigos tiene lugar en las peores condiciones, apunto e instruyo a los militares que hagan con alta determinacion ideologica los ejercicios como si fueran un combate de verdad para cumplir sus misiones en cualquier momento y bajo cualesquier circunstancias y condiciones.
					
					 El EPC debe completar los preparativos de combate al materializar en la labor politica y militar el espiritu de la reunion ampliada de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, senalo y destaco la necesidad de levantar la ola de entrenamiento del monte Paektu en todas las unidades del EPC.
					
					  Los ejercicios de hoy demuestran que es muy importante asentarlos sobre la base cientifica como lo demanda la guerra moderna, dijo y enseno los remedios detallados para ese fin.
					
					 Como he subrayado viendo los ejercicios de la gran unidad combinada 526 del EPC, para vencer a los enemigos, es preciso seguir realizando ingentes esfuerzos por estudiar y completar sin cesar los metodos de guerra al estilo coreano que convengan a los requisitos de la guerra moderna y por modernizar los armamentos, asevero.
					
					 Continuo que los uniformados del EPC deben dar acicates a los preparativos de combate manteniendose siempre en el estado de maxima alerta y reitero que si los enemigos dan algun movimiento sospechoso, deben atacarlos de manera sucesiva y destruir el bastion de agresores usando la inagotable capacidad de combate.
					
					 Por la noche de ese dia, Kim Jong Un invito a Pyongyang a los oficiales y soldados participantes en las maniobras y se fotografio con ellos.

articles.title: Cuadros de Estado visitan alojamiento de contribuyentes a prueba nuclear
articles.content:
Cuadros de Estado visitan alojamiento de contribuyentes a prueba nuclear 
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, y Choe Yong Rim, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros se reunieron los dias 22 y 23 en el alojamiento con los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros, constructores militares y funcionarios de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional quienes contribuyeron al exito de la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea y felicitaron calurosamente a ellos, heroes de la nacion.
					 Los contribuyentes, invitados a Pyongyang, pasan los dias dichosos recibiendo el privilegio y tratamiento preferente.
					
					 Kim y Choe dijeron que tal exito en la prueba nuclear subterranea deviene un gran acontecimiento en la historia nacional que demostro fehacientemente: Corea cumple lo que decide.
					
					 Prosiguieron que todo el pais enaltece como patriotas a los desarrolladores de armas nucleares quienes resonaron majestuosamente el trueno nuclear de la independencia y dieron golpe demoledor a los yanquis y sus satelites.
					
					 Les exhortaron a desarrollar mas la tecnologia nuclear del pais.
					
					 Al final, les encomendaron intensificar por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear, maxima herencia patriotica del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, y glorificar a la RPDC como invencible pais con armas nucleares.
					
					 Con anterioridad, el secretario Pak To Chun y otros funcionarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea tambien lo hicieron.

articles.title: Premiados los contribuyentes a prueba nuclear
articles.content:
Politica hostil de EE.UU. empujo a RPDC a poseer arma nuclear, comenta ACNC
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publicado el dia 21, fueron premiados 11 mil 592 cientificos, tecnicos, obreros, constructores militares y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron a resaltar la dignidad independiente y el temperamento invencible de la Corea del Songun al ejecutar con exito la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea.
					 Fueron otorgados a 100 el titulo de Heroe de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la Medalla Estrella de Oro y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase; a 17, la Orden Kim Jong Il; a 19, el Premio Kim Jong Il y a 50, el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il.
					
					 12 recibieron el titulo de Cientifico del Pueblo; 24, el titulo de Cientifico Benemerito; 20, el titulo de merito; 300, la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase; 950, la Orden del Trabajo; 3 mil, la Orden Bandera Nacional de segunda clase; a 300, la Orden de Honor al Soldado de primera clase; 3 mil, la Orden Bandera Nacional de tercera clase; 800, la Orden de Honor al Soldado de segunda clase; 2 mil, la Medalla del Merito Laboral; un mil, la Medalla del Merito Militar.

articles.title: Politica hostil de EE.UU. empujo a RPDC a poseer arma nuclear, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Politica hostil de EE.UU. empujo a RPDC a poseer arma nuclear, comenta ACNC
 Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- Empujar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a poseer armas nucleares deviene desenlace inevitable y error mas grande de la politica hostil de Estados Unidos a la primera.
					 La tercera prueba nuclear subterranea realizada recientemente por la RPDC constituye una rotunda medida autodefensiva frente a las acciones hostiles de EE.UU. que violo flagrantemente el derecho a lanzar satelites artificiales con fines pacificos.
					
					 El hecho, como etapa importante de enfrentamiento nuclear RPDC-EE.UU. que prosigue de siglo en siglo, es la victoria orgullosa de justicia lograda en la batalla politica y diplomatica y la militar y economica contra la injusticia.
					
					 Desde el principio, la RPDC no necesitaba hacer la prueba nuclear ni tenia el plan correspondiente.
					
					 Fue la meta de la RPDC concentrar las fuerzas en la construccion economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo basandose en el disuasivo nuclear ya preparado para la autodefensa.
					
					 El lanzamiento de la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3" tenia como su objetivo establecer el correcto sistema de pronostico del tiempo y de prevencion de desastres naturales, resolver el problema de materias primas y combustibles mediante la correcta prospeccion y medicion y desarrollar en la etapa mas alta varias ramas como la agricultura, la industria extractiva, la metalurgia, etc.
					
					 Es el derecho legitimo de un Estado soberano lanzar los satelites artificiales con fines indispensables para el desarrollo economico y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					 Hasta ahora, EE.UU. vino negando ese derecho solo a la RPDC, fabrico la absurda "resolucion de sancion" y cometio acciones hostiles anti-RPDC en todos los planos.
					
					 El imperio instigo a otras fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC a hacer una demostracion militar de mayor intensidad y crear el clima de guerra, amenazando asi el derecho a existencia de la RPDC.
					
					 Esto es el motivo principal que obligo a la RPDC a realizar la prueba nuclear.
					
					 A traves de las decadas pasadas, el pueblo coreano experimento en carne propia la verdad de que la paz no llega por si sola y la mejora de la vida del pueblo tiene su unica garantia en el poderoso disuasivo de guerra. Por esta razon el pueblo coreano se vio obligado a realizar la prueba nuclear para la defensa de su soberania.
					
					 El mal juicio y error de EE.UU. en el establecimiento de su politica sobre la RPDC y el proceso de su cumplimiento, que continua siglo por siglo, parten de su veto cronico y hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					 Se torna cada dia mas brutal la politica hostil de EE.UU. para aplastar el regimen socialista de la RPDC, lo cual obliga a esta tomar duras medidas autodefensivas.
					
					 Ya la RPDC habia reiterado su posicion de que se vio obligada a revisar generalmente el problema nuclear debido a las crecientes maniobras anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y advirtio que en el caso de que EE.UU. no escoja una politica correcta, el poderio disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC se modernizara y se ampliara en un grado inimaginable.
					
					 Hoy dia, la opinion publica internacional evalua que la erronea opcion de EE.UU., que considera a la RPDC como espina atravesada en su garganta, ofrece a esta ultima el motivo de desarrollar, obtener y poseer armas nucleares.
					
					 El enfrentamiento nuclear RPDC-EE.UU. no sera un juego.
